author: Reuters
title: Coronavirus | South Korea reports fewest cases since Feb. 29
description: South Korea reported on Monday its lowest number of new virus cases and the extended downward trend in daily infections since the peak on February 29 has boosted hopes that Asia’s largest outbreak out
content:
South Korea reported on Monday its lowest number of new virus cases and the extended downward trend in daily infections since the peak on February 29 has boosted hopes that Asias largest outbreak outside China may be abating.
